gameDetails.name: Marvel Champions: The Card Game â€“ Falcon Hero Pack
gameDetails.description:
Sam Wilson has always helped people, serving as a prodigious social worker even before he became a soaring superhero. Once he donned a pair of high-tech vibranium wings, Sam—also known as the Falcon—used his aerial ability and empathic connection with birds to provide his fellow Avengers a powerful tactical advantage, and now he’s flying into your games of Marvel Champions: The Card Game! With his keen eyesight and ability to detect incoming threats, Falcon is an adaptable hero and a great addition to any team. Within this hero pack, you will find Falcon, his fifteen signature cards, and a full assortment of Leadership cards to help you command your allies from the skies. This pack also includes a bonus modular encounter set featuring Fixer of the Thunderbolts!

Anyone looking to take on the agents of A.I.M. will want to add the Falcon Hero Pack to their collection! This expansion comes with a 40-card pre-built deck, giving you the chance to start playing from the moment you open the box.

—description from the publisher
